summary: Design and build a modern, bold, premium fitness gym marketing website for "Hype The Gym" with a white + gold premium light theme, strong typography, mobile-first responsive UI, and key lead-capture features (membership and free-trial forms, WhatsApp/call buttons, maps, SEO, fast loading). Remove the entire Before/After transformation section site-wide.
architectural_notes: Use realistic gym interior, trainers, and equipment visuals; fitness icons and motivational graphics.
Use placeholder business details (phone, email, address, hours) and motivational/professional tone across content.
Apply a premium light theme site-wide: white backgrounds with gold accents; maintain strong typography and premium spacing.

existing_features.title: Implement a 9-page marketing website for the fitness brand “Hype The Gym” with client-side routing and a consistent global layout (header navigation + footer) for these pages: Home, About Us, Programs / Training Plans, Trainers, Membership Plans, Gallery, Contact Us, Blog / Fitness Tips, FAQ.

Apply a dark luxury, high-energy visual theme across the site: primarily black backgrounds with red and neon blue accents, strong modern typography, premium spacing, and responsive layouts optimized for mobile and desktop.

Build the Home page with the specified sections and content structure: (1) Hero section with headline “Transform Your Body. Transform Your Life.” and CTA buttons “Join Now” and “Book Free Trial”; (2) About Hype The Gym (mission + vision); (3) Popular Training Programs with icons and images; (4) Membership Plans preview; (5) Before & After transformation gallery; (6) Testimonials; (7) Why Choose Hype The Gym; (8) Trainer profiles with certifications; (9) Google Map + Contact section; (10) Footer with contact details and social media links.

Create a Programs / Training Plans page that clearly presents all requested programs with descriptive, motivational copy and program cards/sections for: Weight Loss Training, Muscle Building, Personal Training, Cardio Training, CrossFit & HIIT, Yoga & Zumba, Strength & Conditioning, Fat Loss Bootcamp, Diet & Nutrition Coaching.
Create a Trainers page and Home-page trainer section featuring trainer cards with realistic trainer visuals, names, roles/specialties, and visible certification tags/labels.

Create a Membership Plans page and Home-page plans preview featuring multiple tiers (e.g., Basic/Standard/Premium) with pricing placeholders, included benefits, and a prominent “Join Now” CTA that opens the Online Membership Form.

Implement an Online Membership Form (lead capture) that collects at minimum: full name, phone, email, selected plan/program interest, preferred start date, and optional message; validate required fields; show success/error states after submission.

Implement a Free Trial Booking Form (lead capture) that collects at minimum: full name, phone, email, preferred date/time, preferred program, and optional notes; validate required fields; show success/error states after submission.

Add persistent quick-contact UI actions: a WhatsApp chat button linking to WhatsApp using the placeholder phone number (+91 9XXXXXXXXX) and a “Call Now” button linking via tel: to the same placeholder number; ensure these are mobile-friendly and do not obstruct primary content.

Integrate Google Maps on the Home contact section and on the Contact Us page using an embeddable map (iframe-based) with the placeholder address (“Add full gym address here”) and include a clearly structured contact block (phone, email, address, opening hours: 5 AM - 11 PM).

Create a Gallery page that includes (a) realistic gym interior images, (b) workout equipment imagery, and (c) a Before & After transformation gallery section; include a responsive grid with lightbox/modal viewing.

Create a Blog / Fitness Tips page that lists multiple posts (seed content) with motivational, professional fitness-focused tone; include a blog post detail view/page for reading the full article content.

Create an FAQ page with common gym FAQs (seed content) covering membership, trial sessions, opening hours, training programs, nutrition coaching, and safety; present in an accordion layout for fast scanning.

Add SEO-optimized layout basics: per-page document titles and meta descriptions, semantic headings/landmarks, Open Graph defaults, and performance-minded image usage (optimized sizes, lazy-loading where appropriate) to ensure fast loading and mobile-friendly behavior.

Use the provided placeholders consistently across the website wherever contact/business details appear: Gym Name “Hype The Gym”, Phone “+91 9XXXXXXXXX”, Email “info@hypethegym.com”, Address “Add full gym address here”, Opening Hours “5 AM - 11 PM”.

Add the generated image assets to the frontend as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them throughout the site (hero, programs, trainers, gallery) without fetching images through the backend.

Fix the Before/After transformation section so the AFTER image is present and visibly renders anywhere the transformation pair appears (Home page preview and Gallery page transformation section). Ensure the referenced asset path `/assets/generated/hype-after-1.dim_1200x1200.png` exists in `frontend/public/assets/generated` and does not render as a broken/missing image.

Update the Trainers page so every trainer card uses a distinct (non-repeated) trainer image. Replace the currently duplicated trainer images by introducing additional generated trainer portrait assets and updating the trainer data to reference unique files for all 6 trainers.
Decrease the displayed price by ₹1,000 for every membership plan tier across the site (Basic, Standard, Premium), including the Home page plans preview and the Membership Plans page.

Remove the entire “Before & After / Transformation” section everywhere it appears on the site, including the Home page and the Gallery page, so that no before/after transformation UI, headings, copy, or images are rendered.
Change the site-wide theme to a premium light look (white base with gold accents) and remove any forced dark-mode behavior so the entire site renders in light theme by default.

Update existing UI components that hard-code the previous accent colors (currently using specific OKLCH color literals) to use the new white+gold design tokens/variables so the premium gold accent is consistent across Header, Hero, Contact headings, Footer, and other highlighted elements.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create 9-page site structure: Home, About Us, Programs/Training Plans, Trainers, Membership Plans, Gallery, Contact Us, Blog/Fitness Tips, FAQ
Build Home page sections per spec (hero w/ headline + CTAs, about, popular programs, plans preview, before/after, testimonials, why choose, trainer profiles, map/contact, footer/social)

Add Programs/Training Plans content covering listed programs (weight loss, muscle building, personal training, cardio, CrossFit/HIIT, yoga/zumba, strength/conditioning, fat loss bootcamp, diet/nutrition coaching)
Implement Free Trial Booking Form (lead capture)
Add WhatsApp chat button and Call Now button for quick contact
Integrate Google Maps on contact section/page
Apply SEO-optimized layout and performance requirements (fast loading, mobile friendly)

Implement backend storage and retrieval for submitted Membership and Free Trial leads in the single Motoko main actor, including: create endpoints for submissions, basic server-side validation, and an endpoint to fetch recent submissions (for developer verification).
Update trainer visuals so each trainer uses a distinct/different image (no duplicates/too-similar images)
Decrease pricing by 1000 for all membership plans (all tiers) across the site
Remove the entire Before & After transformation section wherever it appears (Home page and Gallery)
Change the site-wide theme to a premium light look: white base with gold accents (replace prior dark luxury theme)
